summary: Metadata issue may lead to loss of access to some storage areas

updates.details: We are seeing warnings on some storage and group workspaces which may lead to loss of access. Vendor support have been contacted. Group workspaces already migrated to the new storage not at risk.

summary: Advance notice of next regular scheduled maintenance day

updates.details: Advance notice of scheduled maintenance day on Tues 27th January 2026. Please plan your work to minimise disruption.

LOTUS maintenance completed, reservations lifted, still missing some CPU nodes and most GPU nodes. External access to Object store (*.s3-ext.jc.rl.ac.uk), login.jasmin.ac.uk and data transfer services (Globus, hpxfer & ftp.ceda) still unavailable. Fixes anticpated by Wed 28 Jan lunchtime.

External access to several services still unavailable: single login service, external Object store (*.s3-ext.jc.rl.ac.uk), and data transfer services (Globus, hpxfer & ftp.ceda). Latest estimate is end of today Wed 28 Jan. Note individual login servers 1-4 still available (but see notice re closure in Feb).
External access to services now restored (single login service, and data transfer services (Globus, hpxfer & ftp.ceda). Still checking external Object store access (*.s3-ext.jc.rl.ac.uk)

summary: Closure of separate login servers, use single login service instead.

updates.details: Advance notice that on 10 FEB 2026 the separate login servers will close. Please now use the single login service login.jasmin.ac.uk.

Overlapping with, but for a longer period than the JASMIN scheduled maintenance day, scheduled maintenance to the tape library will make it unavailable from the afternoon of Monday 26 January until work is completed later that week (date/time TBC).
Tape maintenance is currently underway with a provisional completion date of Thursday 29th January.
